name: Power Apple Zombies
description:
Will you be able to save the world from zombies? Use Power Apples against them!

Next Story Message: Space Bar or any key
Default Attack: Space Bar
Use Power Apple: P key
Move Left: A or Left direction key
Move Right: D or Right direction key
Jump: W or Up direction key
Crouch: S or Down direction key

For best experience, please click full screen follow by green flag to start game.
